text: The 2007 Kowloon City District Council election was held on 18 November 2007 to elect all 22 elected members to the 27-member District Council. ==Overall election results== Before election: {| style="width:50%; text-align:center;" |+ ↓ |- style="color:white;" | style="background:green; width:50%;" | 11 | style="background:red; width:50%;" | 11 |- | Pro-democracy | Pro-Beijing |} Change in composition: {| style="width:50%; text-align:center;" |+ ↓ |- style="color:white;" | style="background:green; width:27.27%;" | 6 | style="background:red; width:72.73%;" | 16 |- | Pro-dem | Pro-Beijing |} ==References== ==External links== * Election Results - Overall Results Category:2007 Hong Kong local elections
title: 2007 Kowloon City District Council election
